actions.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 102-514, by Mr. Derrick.

Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 4990 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit. All points of order against the bill and against its consideration are waived. Measure will be considered read. Specified amendments are in order. The amendment printed in part 1 of the report of the Committee on Rules shall be considered as having been adopted upon the adoption of the resolution. No other amendments are in order except the amendments printed in part 2 of the report of the Committee on Rules accompanying this resolution. All points of order against the amendments printed in part 2 of the report are waived. If both amendments are adopted, only the latter amendment which is adopted shall be considered as finally adopted and reported back to the House. The provisions of sec. 1017 of the Impoundment Control Ac...
Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 128.

Point of order raised by Mr. Solomon on the content of the measure. The provisions of H. Res. 447 violate the rules of the House in that a motion to recommit containing instructions is expressly prohibited. Point of order overruled by the Chair.
Mr. Solomon appealed the ruling of the Chair.
Mr. Derrick moved to table the appeal of the ruling of the Chair.
On motion to table the appeal of the ruling of the Chair. Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 253 - 161 (Roll no. 109).
DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 257 - 160 (Roll no. 110).
On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote: 240 - 178 (Roll no. 111).
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

official_title: Providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 4990) rescinding certain budget authority, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 4990 (budget rescissions).

titles.title: Providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 4990) rescinding certain budget authority, and for other purposes.
